poem:
### Vintage Dreams

In the haze of youthful ambition,  
a glass of Latour beckoned from the horizon,  
promising entry into a vinous utopia.  
But the years passed with meager raises,  
while Bordeaux rose on wings of inflation.  
Now, I sip nostalgia from a humble bottle,  
the taste of what could have been—  
whispers of grape still dance on the palate.
